Html:
Hi there,

I intend to decode from a continuous stream of input from microphone, sinusoidal signals. In cardre decode tone CCIR ZVEI a radio channel and send it over the network.
The tones succeeds with a length of 100 ms and the second appears immediately after, with a total length 500ms.

I tried the FFT and GoertzelFilter, but it seem that I can't work this out.

First of all, I want do decode (semi)instantly the incomming frequency.

Can you help me, thank you,

Michael
